short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: To link to blockchain addresses automagically

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Get easy access to scanner links after selecting an address. 

Just select an address and click on the button that appears next to it. It will direct you to the blockchain of the address.

More features to come in upcoming releases. Stay Tuned
